plot: The working process of abstract painter Jean Miotte is observed in great detail in director Raoul Ruiz's unconventional documentary.
title: Miotte vu par Raúl Ruiz
plot_es: The working process of abstract painter Jean Miotte is observed in great detail in director Raoul Ruiz's unconventional documentary.
plot_en: The working process of abstract painter Jean Miotte is observed in great detail in director Raoul Ruiz's unconventional documentary.
